## Introduction

This is a report on deaths from 2015 until May 31, 2018 obtained from the pdf titled RD-Mortality-Report_2015-18-180531.pdf from the dslabs library.


## Deaths by date

We note the seasonality with a peak around the new year by generating a smoothed plot of deaths by date:
